summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4856 for the improvement of the alley in Block 91, Terry's 2nd Addition, being the alley between Terry Avenue and Boren Avenue, extending from James Street to Cherry Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55875, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
